message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor to start. This gives us both something and avoids us losing money to inflation.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I think a more even split is fairer. How about 60/40?
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to negotiate a bit. 65/35 - it's a better deal than you'll get if you drag this out further.
Alice, we're getting close, but the split still needs to be fairer.  55/45 is my final offer.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. My offer is still better than anything you'll get if you keep rejecting.  62/38, take it or leave it.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. A 50/50 split is the only fair solution.  Let's end this and both get something!
